div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: The Lawrenceburg Community School Corporation has combined all updates for parents and staff to one convenient location on our website. Please click here for information.

img.alt: Lawrenceburg Primary Dual Language Immersion Program

h3.a: Lawrenceburg Primary Dual Language Immersion Program

div.p: Lawrenceburg Primary School has launched a Dual Language Immersion program in kindergarten and first grade. Students spend half of their day learning the Indiana College and Career Readiness...

img.alt: Bus Replacement and Capital Project Plan

h3.a: Bus Replacement and Capital Project Plan

div.p: Lawrenceburg Community School Corporation has made our Bus Replacement Plan and Capital Project Plan available to the public. Please click on the link to learn more. https://drive.google.com/file/...
